attributes.action: Make pubs and clubs give free soft drinks or tea and coffee to nominated drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unjust and unfair that soft drinks often cost as much or more than alcoholic ones.  If a group/family go out for a drink then the person responsible for driving should be given a Nominated Driver status as seen in the US and soft drinks supplied for free.  This would help in the fight against drink driving.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
